title: FIGHTING THE STORM
description: Marina-Lynne is in over her head. That's a complete understatement. This time, however, she realizes she needs to create her own network of allies in an age-old battle between good and evil.Kavan refuses to give up the fight and Rys has found his calling in life - even if that means being on the run.As an unexpected alliance is formed, one thing is clear - they are on a mission to thwart the darkness and, if possible, stay alive.It is time to fight back.
author: Angeline Gallant
